onboarddefinition: As soon as you are secure, perform Salah as due. Surely, Salah is an obligation on the believers that is tied up with time.
qazoaniqlash: We need some information to determine your qadha prayers
firstehtilom: Enter your ehtilam/menstrual period for the first time
firstehtilomdefinition: Prayer becomes obligatory for a Muslim after this time
firstprayer: The time when you started praying
firstprayerdefinition: It will be calculated according to this.
checkinfo: Check that your information is correct
startpraydefinition: You can start doing them now.
logoutquestion: Do you really want to log out?
subhanallohdefinition: May Allah be free of any deficiency.
lailahaillallohdefinition: There is no God bu Allah
salavatdefinition: O Messenger of Allah, peace be upon you
zikrcount: Enter the amount of daily dhikrs
